global.notFound: Sorry the page you are looking for cannot be found.

languageSelection: The app is now in english

home.title: Start
home.allThemesEnded: Congratulations, you have completed all the themes!

about.how1: Once logged in, click on the unlocked theme to access the question set. You will then be able to click on the desired answer or answers. Each correct answer earns 100 points.
about.how2: You can find all the answers in the "Answers" section and your score in the "Score" section.
about.what1: IncluScore is a micro-learning system that allows you to raise awareness in a quick, fun and efficient way!
about.what2: Browse the different themes to be untouchable after your participation in this inclusive quiz.

answers.hereLater: Your answers will be posted here later.

new-pwd.label: Password (define a password of at least 5 characters)

login.signInWithThatEmail: You are connected with the address

end.bravo: Congratulations, you have completed the quiz.

nps.notationTitle: Your opinion is important to us! Are you satisfied with the application?
nps.whyXpWasBad: We are sorry that the application did not suit you, can you tell us more about what went wrong? 😔
nps.whyXpWasMedium: Thank you for your feedback, in the interest of improvement, could you tell us more about your experience during this quiz? 👌
nps.whyXpWasGood: We are glad you like the application, do you have something to tell us? 😀
